basics.name: Uday Theja
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Working as a Software Developer at Nutanix, Banglore. Graduated in 2019 with a B.Tech and M.tech in Computer Science & Engineering from IIT Madras.

education.area: B.Tech. & M.Tech. in Computer Science & Engineering

education.institution: Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan Public School, Hyderabad

highlights: Worked under the guidance of Dr. C. Krishna Mohan, Associate Professor, CSE department , IIT Hyderabad.
Implemented a distribution preserving kernel support vector machine which retains the first and second order statistics of the entire dataset in each of the local partitions.
Implemented distributed parallel algorithms for the existing sequential K-Means++ and GMM algorithms for big data.

Developed a web application capable of chat and voice interaction, for SUSI.AI, an intelligent open source personal assistant which uses custom defined skills to reply to user queries and also has different personalization features.

Auto deployed the server on Google Cloud with Kubernetes such that on every commit pushed to the github repository, using Travis CI, a new docker image is built and the docker hub image and cloud deployment get updated.

internships.area: Data Analysis and Machine Learning, R language
highlights: Using the past FICO scores of a card member, predicted FICO score in the future, by building different models using Time Series Analysis and Machine Learning Techniques like: ETS, ARIMA, Regression, Neural Networks.
Received a Pre-Placement Offer.
Worked on an AI powered assistant which automates scheduling of meetings through emails.
Developed the backend for email interface, creating and editing calendar events using GMAIL and Nylas APIs.
Created a facebook messenger bot which uses webhooks to reply to a customer.

pors.organization: Programming and Data Structures Lab, CSE Department, IIT Madras
highlights: Teaching Assistant for Programming and Data Structures Lab
Exebit is the annual technical fest of CSE Department, IIT Madras.
I was head of the WebOps (Web Operations) team responsible for creating and maintaining the fest website.
Saarang is the annual cultural fest of IIT Madras.
Part of a team of 30, coordinating the participant registrations and ensuring a pleasant stay for the participants.
Shaastra is the annual technical fest of IIT Madras.
Part of a team of 20, responsible for design and management of Shaastra goodies and t-shirts.
Handling the annual Placement season at IIT Madras, held in December.
Coordinating with various companies and inviting them to come to recruit from the campus directly.

pors.organization: MITR (Mentoring for Individual Transformation), IIT Madras
highlights: MITR is an initiative aimed at guiding and counseling students during their stay at IIT Madras.
MITR also organizes various activities in relation to the orientation of fresh students to IITM life.
Mentor for 7 first year students.

achievements.title: JEE-Advanced 2014
achievements.summary: Secured All India Rank 334 in JEE-Advanced 2014 (formerly IIT-JEE) examination.

achievements.title: JEE Mains 2014
achievements.summary: Secured All India Rank 58 in JEE Mains 2014.

achievements.title: EAMCET 2014
achievements.summary: Secured State Rank 137 in EAMCET 2014, Andhra Pradesh Engineering Entrance Test.
